channel.title: Posting problem
channel.description: Every time I try to post a description of my problem here I get an error essage that says "Sorry, you can't include links in your posts".

item.title: Posting problem
item.dc:creator: alacos
item.description:
Hi Patrick + thanks. In fact my problem seems to have disappeared now. Upon attempting to update Whonix 14.0.1.4.4 (in VirtualBox on Debian), I was getting an apt-get error message to the effect that the relevant repository no longer had a release file. I could see that a similar problem had been addressed on the forum before, simply by suggesting that the user wait a while for a server which had gone down to be restored. But in my case this problem had persisted for a long time so I was beginning to wonder. It’s OK now, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Posting problem
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Spam prevention we have to use unfortunately.
Can you please try posting links without https:// and without www?

Read full topic
